programme.title: The Crossing Guard (1995)
programme.desc: A divorced jeweler (Jack Nicholson) tells the drunken driver (David Morse) who ran down his daughter hell be back in three days to kill him.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma (2007)
programme.desc: A rancher (Christian Bale) and the captive outlaw (Russell Crowe) in his charge learn to respect each other on a dangerous journey to catch a train.

programme.title: Gasoline Alley (2022)
programme.desc: Set in the underbelly of Los Angeles, a man is drawn into a high-profile triple murder. The two police detectives on his tail soon join him in attempting to uncover an explosive conspiracy.

programme.title: Hostage (2005)
programme.desc: A former hostage negotiator (Bruce Willis) must take action when three carjackers hold a wealthy man (Kevin Pollak) and his children at gunpoint.

programme.title: World Trade Center (2006)
programme.desc: Two Port Authority officers become trapped in the rubble of the World Trade Center after going in to help people escape from the buildings during the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001.

programme.title: Full Metal Jacket (1987)
programme.desc: A Marine (Matthew Modine) and his companions (Adam Baldwin, Vincent DOnofrio) endure basic training under a sadistic drill sergeant and fight in the 1968 Tet offensive.

programme.title: Marathon Man (1976)
programme.desc: The CIA and a Nazi death-camp dentist (Laurence Olivier) chase a New York graduate student (Dustin Hoffman).

programme.title: Limitless (2011)
programme.desc: An unemployed writer rises to the top of the financial world after an experimental drug gives him extraordinary mental acuity.

programme.title: Star Trek: Section 31 (2025)
programme.desc: Emperor Philippa Georgiou faces the sins of her past after joining a secret division of Starfleet thats tasked with protecting the United Federation of Planets.

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: Case 39 (2009)
programme.desc: A social worker (Renee Zellweger) saves a girl (Jodelle Ferland) from abusive parents but finds there is more to the child than meets the eye.

programme.title: Primal Fear (1996)
programme.desc: A publicity-seeking Chicago lawyer (Richard Gere) vies with an embittered ex-lover (Laura Linney) prosecuting an altar boy (Edward Norton) in a high-profile murder case.

programme.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit (2014)
programme.desc: To stop a devastating terrorist plot against the United States, CIA recruit Jack must quickly evolve from soldier to analyst to full-fledged operative.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.desc: Globe-trotting archaeologist Indiana Jones races the Nazis for possession of a legendary religious artifact.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.desc: In 1935 archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford), a lounge singer (Kate Capshaw) and a Chinese orphan (Ke Huy Quan) search for mystical stones stolen from an Indian tribe.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: Archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford) rescues his kidnapped father (Sean Connery), and the two race the Nazis to find the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.desc: Indy (Harrison Ford) and a young adventurer (Shia La Beouf) must ferret out a powerful artifact and keep it out of the hands of a deadly Soviet agent (Cate Blanchett).

programme.title: Event Horizon (1997)
programme.desc: A spaceship missing for seven years finally re-emerges and sends out a distress signal. But when a team is sent out to investigate, they discover that something sinister has taken over the craft.

programme.title: Paid in Full (2002)
programme.desc: A dry cleaners delivery boy becomes one of the most powerful drug dealers in 1980s Harlem. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Freedoms Path (2022)
programme.desc: When Union soldier William runs from battle, hes taken to safety by a heroic young Black man. Kitch is part of a secret community of freed slaves running a section of the Underground Railroad, but a desperate slave catcher is on their trail.

programme.title: Stop-Loss (2008)
programme.desc: A soldier (Ryan Phillippe) whose tour of duty has ended takes matters into his own hands when the Army tries to force him back into active duty in Iraq.

programme.title: Star Trek Into Darkness (2013)
programme.desc: After an act of terrorism leaves him with a personal score to settle, Capt. Kirk (Chris Pine) defies Starfleet regulations and leads his crew (Zachary Quinto, Karl Urban, Zoë Saldana) on a mission to capture a powerfully destructive force.

programme.title: Sahara (2005)
programme.desc: A treasure hunter (Matthew McConaughey) and his sidekick (Steve Zahn) join forces with a doctor (Penelope Cruz) to search for a Confederate ship in Africa.

programme.title: Major League (1989)
programme.desc: Lackluster baseball players (Tom Berenger, Charlie Sheen, Corbin Bernsen) hear their Cleveland teams new owner is counting on them to lose.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality (2000)
programme.desc: An image consultant transforms a tomboyish FBI agent into a beauty queen so she can work under cover to catch a terrorist.

programme.title: The Comeback Trail (2020)
programme.desc: Indebted to a mobster, a desperate producer tries to "accidentally" kill an aging movie star for an insurance scam. However, he soon begins to realize that the film theyre shooting is a masterpiece in the making.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma (2007)
programme.desc: A rancher (Christian Bale) and the captive outlaw (Russell Crowe) in his charge learn to respect each other on a dangerous journey to catch a train.

programme.title: Patriots Day (2016)
